short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find beer info from ratebeer.com! (just select text and press Alt + B)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Oluttamo helps you to find beer info easily from ratebeer.com. Just select text aka. "beer name" in current web page, press Alt + B (or mouse btn 2 + click "Search beer") and you get beer info into your current page, boom!

You can also use free text search in Oluttamo search results view. 

If you don't find the beer you are looking for, just add it yourself! (Click "This is not the beer I was looking for!"-button, see screenshots)

Extension is open source and can be found from https://github.com/kehittamo/oluttamo-browser-extension
